sourcesContent: import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivitiesService } from '../services/activities/activities.service'; import { Activities } from '../shared/models/Activities'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { activities: Activities[]=[]; constructor(private activitiesService:ActivitiesService){} ngOnInit(): void{ this.activities=this.activitiesService.getAll(); } }
